DOC.brief_summary: Post Market clinical outcome study collect data short - long-term outcome subject undergo undergone Subchondroplasty Procedure foot and/or ankle standard clinical setting . Outcomes assess include pain medication usage , pain , function , activity level patient satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: A Longitudinal Outcomes Study Subchondroplasty® Procedure Foot/Ankle
DOC.detailed_description: This post-market , multi-center , patient outcomes center study evaluate on-label use AccuFill Subchondroplasty procedure ( SCP ) . Enrolled subject sign inform consent form , satisfy inclusion/exclusion criterion least one bone marrow lesion , cyst stress fracture confirm diagnostic imaging foot and/or ankle joint . Demographics , medical history medication record time enrollment . Surgical detail include SCP procedure , concomitant surgical procedure intraoperative safety event record . Subjects complete validate patient report outcomes measure pre-operatively include Foot Function Index ( FFI ) revise short form , EQ-5D™ numeric pain score . These measure plus subject satisfaction survey also administer post-operatively 6 week , 3 month , 6 month , 1 year , 2 year . At 3 year , 4 year , 5 year , numeric pain score patient satisfaction survey collect . Screening adverse event revision surgery occur throughout study . Target enrollment 250 patient 25 clinical site . Subjects complete study 5 year withdrawn patient undergoes revision surgery Subchondroplasty site .
DOC.criteria: Subject least one bone defect bone marrow lesion ( BML ) , cyst stress fracture confirm diagnostic imaging Surgeon consider patient appropriate SCP procedure Subject provide voluntary signature Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve Informed Consent Subject least 18 year age Subject must physically mentally willing able , Investigator 's opinion time enrollment , complete outcome form via internet , telephone regular mail Subject pregnant time surgery Subject incarcerate Subject involve active litigation relate condition treat
